description.en:
A brand new youth comedy from the perspectives of an awkward high school boy × introverted childhood friend.

Fuka Kano looks forward to a sweet and  sour youth, after reading shoujo manga her sister had.

Although she spend time with my childhood friend Aiji Akaji, she is not able to confess to him, it's feels like she is running around in circles...! ?

On the other hand Miu Utsumi, a classmate, is a very outgoing and charming girl. So Kano gathers up her courage to talk to her, but turn out she is troubled by how she is not aware of her own thoughts!

Where will their High School life go!!?

(Please read this if you know Chinese or Japanese)[Spoiler]I translated this from the Chinese translation and description from Amazon using Google translate, if you know Chinese or Japanese please review it and if you feel like it's wrong please edit the description or leave a comment [/spoiler]
[hr][/hr]
普通话(Chinese)[spoiler]以笨拙的男子高中生X内向的女子高中生的双视角所描绘的青春喜剧在此开幕

看到了姐姐的少女漫画后，开始对又酸又甜的青春产生憧憬的高中生·不破叶。
虽然每天都与青梅竹马的赤染爱司在一起，为了交上女朋友而不懈努力，但都是感觉都是在做无用功…！？另一边，是从某天开始，便对不破单相思的同班同学·内海美羽。虽然她鼓起勇气想去跟不破搭话，但总觉得自己的心意不会被察觉而在苦恼着——。
两人的高中生活到底会向何处发展呢！？
[/Spoiler]
